name: Five Nights at Freddy's 4 Ultra Custom Night
name_original: Five Nights at Freddy's 4 Ultra Custom Night
description:
I have created this fangame in order to entertain and that it can be among the "Ultra Custom Nights Alone", just as the user (IAmFuntime) did with the first game and the second.

Now you can play FNAF 4 by choosing which animatronics you want to face and at what level of activity they will move, along with a couple of things that could challenge you more to reach 100%.

  • There will be exclusive characters that will make your survival more complicated!
  • Be aware of sounds at all times!
  • Fight with them without being able to see anything!
  • And else!

And you can also find other types of content.

  • Play the night with the halloween counterparts.
  • Complete challenges and minigames.
  • Earn coins to buy new items.
  • Etc.

Hope you enjoy your new experience with freddy and his friends in the world of nightmares, good luck!
